manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Breathable Cover Soft to the touch and naturally cooling, the 250TC cotton cover makes it ideal for all-season use. Maximum Comfort Down alternative filling provide an allergen-free and comfortable sleep. Anti-Shift Design High-quality materials keep their shape without bunching or distorting, no matter how long you use them.

Taking Care of Your Pillow How to Prep The comforter arrives compress packed. For optimal use, prep as below: Open the plastic wrap and remove itFluff the comforter and flatten creasesOnce loft and unwrinkled, use as desired How to Clean The comforter is fade and stain resistant. For best results, clean as below: Wash on a delicate cycle using cold waterSun dry or low tumble dry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pillows ever
reviews.reviewText: I’m extremely picky … these are the best pillows ever… my husband agrees. Ignore the bad reviews honestly… they look a little lumpy when you first get them but after fluffing them up and waiting a day or 2.. they look perfect. And feel great.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST PILLOWS EVER!
reviews.reviewText: Soft, plush and the most comfortable pillows ever

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the money
reviews.reviewText: Nice pillows. I would rather they had more firmness. They are not the best pillows I have ever had but they are a good value. I certainly am sleeping on them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good night sleep
reviews.reviewText: These are the greatest pillows I’ve ever had, I can’t wait to go to sleep every night and have never slept better!!! Love them!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skeptical but this was the real deal
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about this but a friend referred me to it. I loved the softness of my pillow but could not double it up to make it thick enough. This pillow was just the right height. Not to thick or to thin. And soft like your favorite pillow at your favorite hotel. If you have a king size bed, get the king size pillow. Every time I turn over my pillow is right their to catch me. And right back to sleep I go. I feel like this pillow helps me fall asleep faster. I am getting a better sleep now and I am not blaming my bed for it. It was my pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it, Flattens easily and pillows are half full of stuffing
reviews.reviewText: I unpacked one pillow to see if it was worth all the hype. I'm sorry but its NOT. Pillows seem half full. its evident that when you lay your head on it you won't get any support bc the pillow stuffing will part like the "red sea". Save yourself money and go to Marshalls or TJ maxx and buy from there. I'm a back and side sleeper , and these pillows won't work for me at all

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: So I purchased the 2 pack of pillows about 10 days ago now. So I've been successfully using them for a solid week. I left them to "fluff" and "breath" for 24 hours before using them. So far so good.I split the set between my husband and myself. He isn't to picky about pillows, but recently had shoulder surgery. I asked him if he's noticed a difference before and after surgery. He says he has and that it's very supportive and soft on his shoulder area. He says they are nice pillows.I however am very picky about pillows. I suffer from health issues so my bed is my best friend and I need a good pillow. I don't get much sleep and suffer with chronic migraines as a small preview to health problems. Anyways, I could tell a difference the very night I used it and the following... now after 2 days I started with a migraine so I knew I'd be putting it to the test. It was supportive and did "bounce" back, however; not as I'd hoped like the 1st 2 nights of using it. It's still very good but I am hard on pillows and would rather have an extremely "firm" or filled pillow and be able to remove filling rather than have not enough. Now as I said I did split the set, so maybe the set together will be better. I am looking to order 2 more to test my theory.Overall, for the price for a set, it is comparable to a set of hotel premiere pillows, we've used from Sam's, in price for sure. And this reviews is in comparison to them. I do suggest opening and letting them "rest" and expand to proper size before use. Simply due to being vacuum sealed when sent. I hope keeping a set together will make it a 5 star but will update when received and if something changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've forgotten what a REAL pillow feels like...!
reviews.reviewText: After years and years and decades of using the same ol' pillows...I After a long time, I figured that these (three) pillows have been flattened like pancakes and was maybe time to finally upgrade them and start using proper pillows with actual support (especially in the middle!). You wouldn’t be able to tell from how the manufacturer packages these pillows – in plastic and vacuum packed, causing them to seem very thin and flimsy – but these pillows are as full, supporting, and “plush” feeling as you would imagine “gel fiber filled”! After unpacking it, and letting it slowly fluff to it’s full size, once I was able to put my head and lay on it, my immediate thought was, “I’ve completely forgotten what a REAL pillow feels like!”decided to finally upgrade them; at some point, when you have to stack 2 or 3 very flat pillows, you start to feel that you might not be getting the head support that you might be needing...For better or worse, I'm one of those that fold my pillows to help prop my head up and/or mindlessly stuffs them in between my thighs when I'm on my side. But if you've ever "abused" your pillows like this, you'd know that this quickly flattens the heck out of standard pillows that all of the filling/"fluff" is pushed to the ends of the pillow and away from the middle where the support for the head is supposed to go. So, sometimes it's nice to have rather flat pillows when I have been propping my head up by folding them for hours on end; and I ended up learning to simply stack other flat pillows when I wanted to be propped up and/or not have my head flat. But, in the end, this is not how pillows are meant to be used. Enter these "Sleep Restoration" pillows...It feels real nice laying my head on this pillow; it’s a real nice feeling where my head feels like it’s floating in between completely flat on the mattress to propped up by multiple flat pillows. I haven’t felt that in years!That feeling does come with some compromises though. Even though the Amazon description advertises that it is “cooling” and what not, it may be considered “cooling” compared to other Tempur-Pedic type materials, but it doesn’t mean that laying on it for more than a couple minutes doesn’t make it feel stuffier and later in the night hotter than without it. Also, as nice as it is laying with the back of your head on it, the “gel fiber” “absorption” of the weight does not prop your head up enough when you lay on your side – which I do more than 50% of the night. Without enough support when you are sideways, your head hangs a bit uncomfortably and is made worse as the pillow fluffs in front of your face/mouth and it starts feeling a lot hotter than your old pillows (they don’t have ANY fluff, so there’s no fluff that is gathered and is pushed in front of your side-facing mouth).But, in the end, it is a real nice experience laying my head down on these pillows and really eye-opening after laying on flat ones over the years. There may be some quirks, but it isn’t something that you can’t figure out and have a pleasant lie down.
These pillows are incredible, I've been sleeping so much better ever since they've arrived. 10/10 I recommend.
C'è scritto set di due pezzi ma arrivato un solo cuscino che a 27 euro mi sembra un po' troppo!!! Reso immediato
Really allows for a much cooler sleep.

reviews.reviewTitle: must have for a nice sleep
reviews.reviewText: Since year I was looking for a nice pillow for my husband, and this search included lots of expensive ones... Finally he said we found it! very comfortable and fluffy pillow. and really gives the comfort hotel feeling :)
